[img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/challenges.png[/img]

To complete the Challenge mode, craft transitional elements from given elements to reach objectives using transitional elements. Challenges will gradually increase difficulties, starting with one or two-step recipes and finishing with dozens of intermediate elements!

[img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/challenge-mountain-small.gif[/img]

[img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/sandbox.png[/img]

In sandbox mode, you can freely craft items together and maybe create rare items and discover everything with a little success!
Hundreds of crafting elements are available, some easy to guess, others challenging.

[img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/sandbox-small.gif[/img]

Would you be able to craft every item? To resolve every challenge?
There is only one way to know: begin the new apprentice of Alchemistry!

Note: A Demo is available for free for you to try the game!

[h2]Developer Notes[/h2]

I've been working as a solo developer on this game in my spare time for a few months. I really hope you enjoy playing it and find it relaxing. Developing a small, soothing puzzle/crafting game has been a dream of mine for a while, and I hope this game will be a step toward a full-time indie lifestyle. Thank you for your support; you're helping me achieve my dreams.

This game will be updated as long I have nice ideas I can add without redoing the game from scratch, as I did with the previous game. And even your feature ideas can be added if compatible!

We also have a discord community, if you want to join us, where you can share your opinions, questions, etc. about the game.

[url=https://discord.gg/c8aARey][img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/discord.png[/img][/url]
short-description:
Practice Alchemistry, aka the art of merging elements to discover new ones!
Solve challenges or play freely to discover every element.
Craft the entire world from fire to life.
